member.name: M:KnightsAndDragonsCalculatorApplication.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:KnightsAndDragonsCalculatorApplication.Controllers.CalculatorApiController.Calculate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate result of enhancing target armor to target level.

member.name: M:KnightsAndDragonsCalculatorApplication.Controllers.CalculatorApiController.Calculate(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate result of enhancing target armor to target level using another armor.
member.param: Name of armor used to enhance target armor

member.name: M:KnightsAndDragonsCalculatorApplication.Controllers.CalculatorApiController.Calculate(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculate result of enhancing an armor of target rarity using provided feed parameters
member.param: Base feed EP to enhance with
Do armors used in enhancement have same element

member.name: M:KnightsAndDragonsCalculatorApplication.Controllers.CalculatorApiController.Calculate(KnightsAndDragonsCalculatorApplication.Calculator.EpicBossRequest)
member.summary: Calculate damage done/taken against epic boss using specific armors

member.summary: Calculate the result of combining 2 armors.

member.name: M:KnightsAndDragonsCalculatorApplication.Controllers.CalculatorApiController.Split(System.String)
member.summary: Calculate the armors that can be use to combine to get target armor

member.summary: Gets armor from armor name.
